titleStmt.title: The generall historie of the magnificent state of Venice From the first foundation thereof vntill this present. Collected by Thomas de Fougasses, gentleman of Auignon, out of all authors, both ancient and moderne, that haue written of that subiect. Englished by VV. Shute. Gent.
Histoire générale de Venise. English
titleStmt.author: Fougasses, Thomas de.
Shute, W.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld, and W. Stansby,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Histoire générale de Venise.
Stansby printed A-2Z and 5V-5Z; Eld printed the rest (STC).
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
"The second volume of the generall history of Venice" has divisional title and begins new pagination on 4A1r.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
